Careers
Join a League
Whether you’re looking to join a competitive league or bowl socially, Bowlero Port St. Lucie has you covered. Find your perfect league or tournament in Port St. Lucie, Florida today.
Find a League
Find a Tournament
Top Reasons to Join a League
Receive Exclusive Perks
Join a league today to receive exclusive perks. Free practice and discounted games. 10% off parties and events and 20% discount on food and beverage.*
Meet and Make Friends
Joining a league is a great way to meet new people in your area! Fellow bowlers become fast friends when you're enjoying those strike dances and come-from-behind victories together.
Certification Program
Every league bowler receives a complimentary membership into the PBA League Bowler Certification program. This program offers a multitude of benefits including - statistics, tournaments, awards, and rules.
Looking to Join a League?
Our bowling leagues are for those who are looking to perfect their game, compete for prizes and make a commitment to their team. Submit your inquiry and you will be contacted from a league representative with next steps and details.
Reasons to Join
Play for prizes
Competitive and fun setting
There are leagues for all skill levels
Automatically become a PBA LBC Member
Free practice and discounted games. 10% off parties and events and 20% discount on food and beverage*
Get Started
Are you interested in starting your own league?
Inquire Now
Ready for a Tournament?
Ready to compete? Then tournaments are for you! Submit your inquiry and you will be contacted from a league representative with next steps and details.
Reasons to Join
Play for prizes
Competitive setting
Make friends
Develop skills
Get Started
Are you interested in hosting your own tournament? Contact us at
Tournaments@BowleroCorp.com
My friend told me about her club. I thought ‘Okay, this could be fun’—and it totally was!
We bowl. We drink. We have a great time. It’s why I don’t have the ‘Sunday Scaries’ anymore.
We bowl. We drink. We have a great time. It’s why I don’t have the ‘Sunday Scaries’ anymore.
There are so many new leagues to choose from every season.
Themed leagues, co-ed leagues, leagues with prize money. There was even an emoji league that I joined. :)
Themed leagues, co-ed leagues, leagues with prize money. There was even an emoji league that I joined. :)
I’ve been bowling in a league since I was a little kid and Bowlero’s leagues have everyone else beat.
They’re fun, competitive, and perfect for bowlers of all skill levels.
They’re fun, competitive, and perfect for bowlers of all skill levels.
Searching for a Social Club?
You want to have fun in a relaxed setting and don’t have too much time to commit. Submit your inquiry and you will be contacted from a league representative with next steps and details.
What is unique to a Social Club?
Low commitment
Short seasons
Play for fun
Make new friends
Relaxed social setting
Get Started
Frequently Asked Questions
What is a bowling league?
What is the difference between a social club and a competitive league?
How long do leagues last?
Do I have to be good at bowling to join a league?
View All FAQs
PBA LBC National Championships
The 2025 PBA LBC National Championships, held at Bowlero Mount Prospect in the greater Chicago area, concluded after seven weekends of competition.
Final standings, leaderboards and earnings are official.
Find Out More

Careers
Parties & Events
Bring your guests to the lanes at Bowlero Port St. Lucie, and turn every occasion into an epic celebration. Our team of party planning experts in Port St. Lucie, Florida is ready to help you get started.
Plan a Party
Contact an Event Planner
Corporate Parties
Elevate your next corporate outing! Our office parties and corporate events are easy to plan and completely stress-free.
Plan a Corporate Event
Kids Parties
Our bowling parties for kids are fun and easy to plan! Design the perfect birthday party for your kids, their friends, and yourself.
Book a Kids Party
Teen Parties
Bowl on blacklight lanes, relax on your own reserved lane, and dig into insta-worthy treats Perfect for teen birthdays!
Book a Teen Party
Social Events
The perfect backdrop for every occasion! Birthdays, bachelorette parties, reunions, and any occasion you can think of!
Book a Social Event
National Events
Let our team of seasoned national event planning experts plan your next National Event.
Host a National Event
Talk to a Planner
Get in touch with our expert party planners and let us bring your event to life!
Contact Us
Parties & Events Menu
We cater to your event with an Instagrammable lineup of oversized shareables, custom party platters, and a wide variety of beer, wine, and craft cocktails.
Let Us Plan Your Next Event!
Whether it’s a birthday party, a corporate gathering, or a fun day out with friends, our event sales team is ready to help make it special. Let’s start planning your unforgettable event today!
Contact Us
Frequently Asked Questions
What kind of parties can be booked online?
What if I'm not sure about my party's final headcount?
Can I add more people to my party’s headcount after I book?
What is your cancellation policy?
What if I need to change/edit my reservation after I've already checked out?
How do I reserve a private room?
Can I reserve private lanes for group events?
View All FAQs
We had such a memorable time at our bowling party!
The venue had a great atmosphere, the service was excellent, and the food was amazing. The online booking process was quick and easy. Will definitely be back for more fun!
The venue had a great atmosphere, the service was excellent, and the food was amazing. The online booking process was quick and easy. Will definitely be back for more fun!
Emily D.
The booking process was so easy
and the staff made us feel like VIPs once we arrived. Plus, the food options were a pleasant surprise - something for everyone to enjoy.
and the staff made us feel like VIPs once we arrived. Plus, the food options were a pleasant surprise - something for everyone to enjoy.
Alex G.
Our party was a hit!
The staff was friendly and helpful our entire visit, and the venue was top-notch.  We'll definitely be back for more celebrations!
The staff was friendly and helpful our entire visit, and the venue was top-notch.  We'll definitely be back for more celebrations!
Michael T.
We had an unforgettable evening at our company holiday party!
The bowling was so fun, and with the added bonus of an arcade, our group had a blast between frames. It was a perfect complement to an already fantastic evening.
The bowling was so fun, and with the added bonus of an arcade, our group had a blast between frames. It was a perfect complement to an already fantastic evening.
Jessica B.
